ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank the Landesamt für Umwelt, Naturschutz und Geologie Mecklenburg Vorpommern and the Struktur‐ und Genehmigungsbehörde Nord, Obere Naturschutzbehörde, Koblenz for granting permissions to pursue this study, Toomas Tammaru and Christophe Lebigre for assistance during field work, and Joaquín Baixeras and two anonymous reviewers for constructive criticism. We acknowledge financial support from the German Research Council (DFG Fi 846/8‐1). MK is associated doctoral researcher of the research training group response funded by the German Research Council (DFG GRK2010).
